actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Street Act of 1968 to authorize grants for the modification of surplus military equipment for law enforcement purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes grants by the Law Enforcement Assistance Administration for the modification and purchase of surplus military equipment for law enforcement purposes. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 3731(b)(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Street Act of 1968 to authorize grants for the modification of surplus military equipment for law enforcement purposes.
